entry.title: S/4 HANA Public Cloud_How to configure the process template when performing a BP mass update
entry.content: In the "Manage Mass Maintenance - BP" app on SAP Fiori, after creating a new project, I couldn't select any process template under the "Process Template" section. As a result, the "Start" button is not clickable. So, where is the process template configured, and how is it set up in SAP Fiori?

entry.title: Replicating material from a non-SAP system to the S/4HANA MDG system
entry.content:
Dear All

I have a project task to replicate material from non-SAP system to S/4HANA MDG system. Changes initiated in non-SAP system will trigger a CR getting automatically created and approved in MDG, along with appropriate mapping, error handling .

Gone through some information and see that ProductMDMBulkReplicateRequest_In can be used in S/4HANA MDG.

Below are the steps i can think of

- Configuring SOA services

- Request in the form of XML

- CR gets created and approved 

 

If any one came across a similar ask and implemented this, would you be able to share the process or steps i should consider to proceed on the task.

Ex: Apart from SOA configuration, any BADI implementation to be considered? for auto- CR creation and mapping 

 

 

regards

Chandra.

entry.title: Error in cross entity derivation for BP (USMD_RULE_SERVICE_CROSS_ET)
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I have a requirement where based on the relationship data entered by user during CR creation, I need to make an additional entry in relationship entity( BP_REL) and also update two custom fields in BP_CENTRL entity.

When the user create an entry in relationship tab in NWBC and press enter, i am using this  method IF_EX_USMD_RULE_SERVICE2~DERIVE of BADI USMD_RULE_SERVICE_CROSS_ET to read the changed entity 'BP_REL' and create an additional entry based on it but getting a dump due to error populated in standard method do_data_check->check_data.
I am getting this error after using WRITE_DATA method and it is resulting in ST22 dump- CX_USMD_WRITE_ERROR
Error message is USMD1A 061.

Kindly could you please help what could be the issue?

entry.title: Business Partner not replicated
entry.content:
Hi All,

I am facing an issue.

We have assigned 2 target systems to one outbound implementation under the same replication model for BP.

One of the replication for one of the target is working fine whereas for the other one there is an error : "028 (BP_DATAREPL_FND) Business Partner not replicated. Please check the configuration".

We checked the other configurations like SOA, everything looks fine. Also, we have 2 targets assigned to one outbound implementation in the other systems and its working fine. 

Could you please help here?

Thanks in advance.

entry.title: How to write change pointers into MDGD_CP when a Z-table is updated (for DRFOUT Change Mode)
entry.content:
Hello experts,

I'm currently working on a scenario where I want to send Material master data (BO=194) from S/4HANA to SAP Digital Manufacturing (DM) using DRFOUT in ‚ÄúChange Mode‚Äù, which is scheduled to run every 10 minutes.

Here is the situation:
„ÉªWhen I execute DRFOUT manually in Change Mode, it successfully retrieves data from the related Z-table, includes it in the IDoc, and sends it to DM without any issue.
„ÉªWhen the Z-table is updated, entries are correctly written to CDHDR/CDPOS and BDCP2.
„ÉªHowever, DRFOUT only generates IDocs when corresponding entries exist in MDGD_CP.
„ÉªTherefore, I would like to ensure that whenever the Z-table is updated, a change pointer is also written to MDGD_CP.
„ÉªI'm considering using the BAdI BDCP_BEFORE_WRITE to insert records into MDGD_CP at the same time as ALE change pointers are written.

My questions are:
„ÉªIs this approach (using BDCP_BEFORE_WRITE to create entries in MDGD_CP) technically valid?
„ÉªIf entries are successfully created in MDGD_CP, can DRFOUT in Change Mode pick them up and generate the IDoc automatically?
„ÉªAre there any additional steps or configuration required to make this linkage work properly?

Any insights, examples, or experience regarding this setup would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you in advance,
Koichi Okamoto

entry.title: Table KNVI ( Customer Master Tax Indicator ) generating extra records
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

On replicating KNVI data from source system to target system, the KNVI table gets updated correctly in target system.

But after 5-10 minutes, some extra records gets created which were not even maintained in Source system. This issue is happening for most of the customers on replication with some exceptions( for few customers KNVI is not having extra records).

From where these extra records are being added after sometimes after replication.

Thanks in Advance

entry.title: How to Read Change Document in MDG Mass Processing
entry.content:
Hi Team,

I am looking for some solution to read change document for plant in Mass Processing MDG because in Mass process based on 1 CR no we have multiple Material with multiple plant.
So how can i fetch which material is linked to which plant?

from code how we can fetch data for mass because in here we have importing parameter CR number only :- 

lo_usmd_chg_doc->read_document_lines(
EXPORTING is_document_header = ls_doc_hdr
io_model = lo_if_model
IMPORTING et_changed_value = lt_cg_doc_vals
et_changed_detail = lt_cg_doc_details ).

Because in lt_cg_doc vals the output for mass process is be like 1st row contain FIELD NAME - MATERIAL & VALUE - MATERIAL NO
2nd ROW contain FIELD NAME - WERKS & VALUE - WERKS NO
So how we can linked 2 rows with each other 

Or do we have some other solution to find out data from Change Document in MDG which plant got change for which Material.

entry.title: Correct approach to get the staging and active data in rule context BADI?
entry.content:
Dear All

I have a Jira - to set modified flag on the plant status(MSTAE, MMSTA) for the material(change CR) in the rule context BADI.

Below are the steps followed

- Created a change flag in the single value decision table(with condition alias), for this condition alias maintained data in user agent decision table

- Created service name 

- Implemented rule context BADI with filter as earlier created service name

- Only in material change CR(not create CR), for the plant status modification changes, I have to check the staging and active values and set modified flag.

 Getting the staging data using API and active data using tables MARA and MARC.

staging data

model_ref->read_char_value(
i_readmode = if_usmd_model_ext=>gc_readmode_default

 

May i know if this the right approach ?

Or getting the active data also using 

model_ref->read_char_value(
i_readmode = if_usmd_db_adapter=>gc_readmode_no_inact

 

Please provide your suggestions.

 

regards

Chandra.

entry.title: SAP MDG FI: Node XXX is not located within the hierarchy
entry.content:
Hi SCN Community,

I hope you are all doing well.

While performing operations on SAP MDG Finance Data Loads (Cost and Profit Center Hierarchy), I encountered an error during File Upload ‚Äì Step 04 (Check & Execute):

"Node XXX is not located within hierarchy."

Interestingly, this cost hierarchy already exists in the system for the given edition, but it is not visible under Display Master Data: Cost Center Group hierarchy.

Here‚Äôs what I have already checked:

  • In Steps 1 to 3 of File Upload, all parameters were evaluated and assigned correctly.
  • The variant settings appear fine.
  • The hierarchy structure in the system matches the Excel file.

I‚Äôm unsure what might be causing this issue. Could anyone please guide me on:

  • What parameters I should re-check or adjust?
  • Possible reasons why the hierarchy is not being recognized at Step 04?
  • Any best practices or troubleshooting steps for this scenario?

Your insights or experiences would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks in advance!

Best Regards, 
Sandeep Suggu.

entry.title: Deletion of Basic data text in Material is not replicating from S4 to ECC
entry.content:
Hi Team,

We have observed that when the basic data text (STXH) exists for a material, the data replicates correctly from S/4 to ECC, and the MATMAS message includes the segment E1MTXHM as expected. However, when we delete the basic data text for the material, the change is not replicated properly to ECC. In this case, the E1MTXHM segment is missing from the MATMAS message, whereas we would expect it to be present with the '003' MSGFN (function code for deletion).

It appears that the standard process deletes the segment entirely, instead of sending an update with MSGFN '003'. Could someone advise on how to ensure that the E1MTXHM segment is included in the MATMAS message to ECC with MSGFN '003' when the basic data text is deleted?
Can someone guide me which badi need to use?
I tried in IDOC_DATA_INSERT but still no luck . 
It would be great if someone can provide a sample code.

Thank you.

entry.title: Field "Standard Method" COMM_TYPE is grayed out for change scenario
entry.content:
Hello,

I have pulled the field "Standard Method" on the address UIBB under the "Standard Communication" Section. This field appears grayed out for change scenario but appears editable for create scenario both are custom CR.

The config(Field Properties) for the custom CR for change scenario is set as "Standard"

This field is independent of any other field , also there is no code to disable this field in field property badi, what is causing the field to be grayed out? how can I enable it for change scenario? what all should I check in the system?

Regards,

Ankit

entry.title: API or function to Reject CR of BP in MDG
entry.content:
Dear Experts, We have a need to create a interface to approve or reject CR of BP in MDG, which using role base workflow. We are tring the method cl_usmd_wf_service->COMPLETE_CREQUEST_WFSTEP to reject CR like this: 

        But after it executed successfully , the CR status is still "To Be Considered and Approved" :

       And the workflow item log is complete but no reject action:

        So we don't know whether this method is the right way to reject CR. What we want is after we reject the CR, the status should be: "To Revise: Perform Changes"

And the workflow log should be like this:

       Is anyone come across this problem ever ,please help us with this, thank you so much!

B.R

Kevin
